segments.text: Are you ready to go to the bank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what do you need to do there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s problem with my bank statement . There ’ s a mistake on it . I also need to withdraw some money some the ATM .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to exchange some money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s right . You ’ re going away next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also want to see if my salary has been paid into my bank account . There was a problem last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to pay my credit bill too . If I don ’ t pay it soon , the credit card company will charge me interest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Their interest rates are usually quite high . It ’ s a good idea to pay off your credit card debts before they attract interest .
segments.speaker: S2
